original_text: People whose minds are in the dark do things that have no good purpose. Keep away from wrong things like that. Instead, show how bad those things really are.
korean_text: 너희는 열매 없는 어둠의 일에 참여하지 말고 도리어 책망하라

sentences.original_text: People whose minds are in the dark
do things that have no good purpose
Keep away from wrong things like that
Instead, show how bad those things really are
